name: Janez Let
about: Janez Let, located in Ljubljana, Slovenia, is a reputable flying school with a rich aviation heritage. Founded on the principles of excellence and safety, Janez Let offers comprehensive flight training programs tailored to meet the needs of aspiring pilots. Our school is associated with the legendary Slovenian pilot Janez Stariha, known for his remarkable career in gliding and commercial aviation. At Janez Let, students benefit from experienced instructors and a fleet of well-maintained aircraft. We provide training from private pilot licenses to advanced certifications, ensuring that our graduates are well-prepared for careers in aviation. With a strong focus on both theoretical knowledge and practical skills, Janez Let is committed to producing competent and confident pilots. Join us to embark on a journey to the skies with professionalism and passion.
